nodes.text: Cluster World Relations was an organization of the Corellian state tasked with promoting good relationships between the Human population and tribal species living on the worlds of the Corellian system. Under the leadership of Director Marx Grocco during the Galactic Civil War, Cluster World Relations worked with Corellian Security Force officers to investigate unlicensed dealings with the Selonians of Talus.

An organization of the Corellian state, Cluster World Relations was tasked with promoting good relationships between the Human population and tribal species living on the worlds of the Corellian system. During the Galactic Civil War, Marx Grocco served as Director of Cluster World Relations.

After the Battle of Yavin, several Selonians of the Neetha Den on Talus were captured by pirates and kept as hostages in order to exploit the rest of the den. The situation generated anti-human sentiments among the Selonian population of Talus and hostile anti-human demonstrations erupted in the city of Nashal. Despite no act of violence against Humans was reported, the local police force and Cluster World Relations issued a travel warning for Nashal. Via Corellia News Service, Marx Grocco explained that this preventive measure was meant to insure the public safety of Talusian human citizens and human travelers for any possible hostile encounters with non-human protestors. During those events, Cluster World Relations worked with officers of the Corellian Security Force in an investigation into any unlicensed dealings with the tribal population of Talus.
